meteredServiceCharge.name: Energy Charge
meteredServiceCharge.description: The Delivery Charge that appears on the customer’s bill is the sum of the Energy Charge plus the Make-Whole Charge. ratePlan.name: Service Classification No. 1 - Seasonal NYSEG Supply Service (NSS)
ratePlan.description: Upon request, customers who, during a period of six or more consecutive months, make only occasional (compared to the balance of the year) or no use of electric service at their premises may have their service maintained throughout the period, not to exceed eight months, and shall be billed for the kWh consumed during this period at the following unit prices per kWh: The Delivery Charge that appears on the customer’s bill is the sum of the Energy Charge plus the Make-Whole Charge. Effective 11/01/23: The total bill for delivery service, however, for the year shall in no case be less than $228.00 plus actual billed Bill Issuance Charges.
